text: Anatoly Mikhailovich Stepin (Анатолий Михайлович Степин, 20 July 1940 – 7 November 2020) was a Soviet-Russian mathematician. His works focused in dynamical systems and ergodic theory. He was born in Moscow. In 1993 he was awarded the academic title of Professor in Mathematics. On 7 November 2020, Stepin died at the age of 80. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Russian mathematicians Category:Moscow State University faculty
title: Anatoly Mikhailovich Stepin
